name: Scary Place (Fred the fred)
description:
Suddenly I remembered a game I played when I was a kid, Purble Place was called, so I made this game.

Plot:

A killer has kidnapped a purble and hid his parts in various cakes. After several purbles ingested it, they became addicted to the purble taste and began to eat each other. 17 years later, you have returned to Purble Place, but it doesn't seem the same.
